title: Addition of Two Real2 Values
description: The function 'R2_ADD2' is designed to perform the addition of two input parameters of type 'REAL2'. It takes two 'REAL2' structures as input, adds their respective members, and returns a 'REAL2' structure containing the sum.
name: R2_ADD2

input.name: X
input.description: The first 'REAL2' structure that contains the first set of values to be added.

input.name: Y
input.description: The second 'REAL2' structure that contains the second set of values to be added.

return_value.description: The 'REAL2' structure that contains the result of the addition of 'X' and 'Y'.

fields.name: R1
fields.description: The first real part of the 'REAL2' structure which is the sum of 'X.R1' and 'Y.R1'.

fields.name: RX
fields.description: The second real part of the 'REAL2' structure which is the sum of 'X.RX' and 'Y.RX'.
